sentences.en: As a player he was unselfish, a true team man.
sentences.cn: 作为一名选手，他毫无私念，真正把自己摆在团队中。

sentences.en: He might have been a little too unselfish at times, Jackson said.
sentences.cn: 他有时打的太无私了, 杰克逊说.

sentences.en: He really is unselfish and above small jealousy and hatred.
sentences.cn: 他是个特没私心的人不会有一丁点妒忌和仇恨的.

sentences.en: He was a brave and unselfish man.
sentences.cn: 他是个勇敢而无私的人.

sentences.en: Heavenly heart means unselfish, natural, unconditional, fair and equal.
sentences.cn: 天心即大公无私, 是很自然 、 很无为 、 很公平的.

sentences.en: Her unselfish acts earned her the respect of all who knew her.
sentences.cn: 她不自私的行为使她挣得所有认识她的人的尊敬.

sentences.en: Her unselfish acts earned the respect of all who knew her.
sentences.cn: 她无私的行为使她赢得了所有认识她的人的尊敬?

sentences.en: His unselfish work is at last beginning to tell.
sentences.cn: 他那番忘我无私的工作终于开始奏效了.

sentences.en: It was unselfish of you to help us.
It would be a mistake to conclude that unselfish concern has disappeared.
sentences.cn: 如果得出结论说无私的关怀已经不复存在,那就错了.

sentences.en: Lao Li was unselfish and modest, always putting the interests of the people before his own.
sentences.cn: 老李大公无私,谦虚谨慎, 总是把人民的利益置于个人的利益之上.

sentences.en: She started to get a reputation as an unselfish girl with a heart of gold.
sentences.cn: 她开始被人们赞誉为有一颗金子般的心的无私女孩。

sentences.en: Sustained altruists do unselfish, often heroic acts over a longer time.
sentences.cn: -始终如一的利他主义者长期表现出无私奉献的精神, 时常会做出一些英雄举动.

sentences.en: The love coming from our parents is unselfish and great.
sentences.cn: 父母对我们的爱是无私的,伟大的.

sentences.en: The love of a mother for her children is dominant, leonine, selfish and unselfish.
sentences.cn: 母亲对子女的爱是出众的, 强健的, 自私的,又是公正的.

trans.tran_cn: 无私的，慷慨的，大公无私
trans.tran_en: caring about other people and thinking about their needs and wishes before your own
